• Infrastructure Engineer – StoragelocationsUS, Arizona, Phoenixposted onPosted 9 Days AgoJR0277455FVCTO - Formal Verification Senior Engineerlocations3 Locationsposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoJR0276239GPU Logic Design Engineerlocations4 Locationsposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoJR0275905Software Application Development Engineerlocations2 Locationsposted onPosted YesterdayJR0277567Senior IP Design Verification Engineerlocations3 Locationsposted onPosted 16 Days AgoJR0277349Senior IP Design Verification Engineerlocations3 Locationsposted onPosted 13 Days AgoJR0277347Enterprise Provisioning and Power Efficiency Engineerlocations2 Locationsposted onPosted 2 Days AgoJR0277465IP Enablement Application Engineerlocations3 Locationsposted onPosted 23 Days AgoJR0273988Senior Pre-Silicon Design Verification Engineerlocations4 Locationsposted onPosted 16 Days AgoJR0277344.

• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related technical field (or equivalent experience).
• Deep expertise and 5+ years hands on experience in a technical role such as a Technical Marketing Engineer, Solutions Architect, Sales Engineer, or a similar customer-facing technical position within the hardware, networking, or enterprise software industry.
• Hands-on experience deploying systems, networking and storage in combination with Docker containers, Kubernetes, service-oriented architecture.
• World-class communication skills with a proven ability to articulate a value proposition to technical and non-technical audiences.
• Hands on experience in system administration.
• Experience collaborating with and contributing to open-source projects.
• Strong programming skills and familiarity with CUDA and GPU fundamentals.
• Work with DGX product management to design, build, and document reference architectures and solutions that showcase the capabilities of our hardware in real-world customer environments.
